newsitem.title: USA: ConAgra sees double-digit FY98 EPS growth.
newsitem.headline: ConAgra sees double-digit FY98 EPS growth.

text.p: ConAgra Inc said it expects double-digit earnings per share growth in fiscal 1998.
"We expect double-digit earnings per share growth in fiscal 1998 and another year of record earnings," the company said Tuesday.
The company also said, "ConAgra's most important financial objective is to average at least 20-percent cash earnings return on equity."
The company said its long-term trend line earnings per share growth target is 14 percent.
"Our plans for fiscal year 1998 (begun May 26) indicate another successful year with continued margin expansion," the food processing giant said.

ConAgra added that it expects a first-quarter gain on the sale of its Country General specialty retailing business will have no material impact on earnings due to offsetting reserves related to other matters and above-budget marketing expenses.
